title: Lowest Methane Emissions from Buildings
description: In 2023, Antigua and Barbuda recorded methane emissions from buildings at just 0.0001 Mt CO2e, one of the lowest in the world.

title: Smallest Land Under Cereal Production
description: As of 2022, Antigua and Barbuda had only 5 hectares of land under cereal production, making it one of the smallest in the world.

title: Lowest Pupil-Teacher Ratio in Upper Secondary Education
description: In 2015, Antigua and Barbuda had a pupil-teacher ratio of 3.71 in upper secondary education, one of the lowest globally.

title: Fewest Industrial Design Applications by Residents
description: In 2021, there was only 1 industrial design application by residents in Antigua and Barbuda, one of the lowest counts worldwide.

title: Minimal Freshwater Withdrawals
description: Antigua and Barbuda's total annual freshwater withdrawals were 0.0044 billion cubic meters in 2021, among the lowest globally.
